about_the_game:
Play as one of the Eternal Warriors and repel the hordes of monsters trying to invade our world!

There's no story here, just roll your dice and kill monsters!

Detailed description :

This is a role-playing game with a very simple dice-rolling system where the aim is to kill as many monsters as possible before dying.

If you die, you can start again! After all, you're one of the Eternal Warriors...

 

Character selection :

Choose your character, or create your own, to battle hordes of monsters.

Each character has its own stats and skills.

 

Bestiary :

There are over 50 different monsters, each with its own stats. The more you kill before you die, the more powerful the monsters you'll face.

 

Statistics :

You can consult the statistics for each character. The number of monsters killed, the number of successful or unsuccessful dice rolls, or the number of perfect or unsuccessful defense moves...

 

Playing time :

Estimated 3 to 4 hours to discover all the monsters in the bestiary.

 

About video distribution :

Distribution is available to individuals and companies without authorization.

For streamers, monetization is possible, but we'd appreciate it if you'd include the game's name in the title of your video or live broadcast, and include a link to the game's Steam page.

Other information:

A demo will be available soon.

name: Eternal Warriors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bits)
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
